message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, Bob. This offers a fair balance considering the risk and potential inflation.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the uncertainty of inflation and my potential for higher returns.
Considering the inflation risk and our previous offers, I propose an equal division of the $10,000. This ensures fairness and reduces the risk for both of us.
